title: The Fallen's Crime
description: Malphas is a Fallen, an angel who rebelled. Anyone who thought he wouldn't get up to mischief on Earth as he did in Heaven is sorely mistaken. This time, that mischief happens to be breaking into a dragon's locked down vault. What, you didn't know there were dragon's in modern London? Get with the times.Follow Malphas as he takes on the traps with his gang of ne'er do well's to pull of the greatest prank of his life.New edition of The Fallen's Crime with a new cover from the author.
author: Izzy Shows
